name: Einfisch
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #9. Theme: Climbing

"Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid" - Albert Einstein, or someone else... who knows?

Content:
Be part of the journey of a young fish to the very top. Help your friend get through emotional challenges while jump- ...climbing to self-love and confidence.

Controls:
wind the mouse to apply a jump force.

Idea and text: qualkappe
Programming and graphics: dunkelgrau
Sound: dassos
Music: azix
